custom-sql.sql: SELECT q.* FROM opencps_question AS q LEFT JOIN opencps_answer as a ON q.questionId = a.questionId WHERE 1 = 1 AND (q.domainCode = ?) AND (q.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (q.publish = ?) AND (q.questionType = ?) AND (q.subDomainCode = ?) AND 1 = 1 GROUP BY q.questionId HAVING count(a.answerId) = ? LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
SELECT o.* FROM opencps_track_client_statistic AS o WHERE o.day <> 0 AND o.createDate BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT o.* FROM opencps_track_client_statistic AS o WHERE o.day <> 0 AND o.createDate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.url
SELECT o.* FROM opencps_track_client_statistic AS o WHERE o.day <> 0 AND o.createDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND o.url = ?
SELECT o.* FROM opencps_track_client_statistic AS o WHERE o.day = 0 AND o.month = 0 ORDER BY o.year ASC
SELECT o.* FROM opencps_track_client_statistic AS o WHERE o.day = 0 AND o.month = 0 GROUP BY o.url ORDER BY o.year ASC
SELECT o.* FROM opencps_track_client_statistic AS o WHERE o.day = 0 AND o.month = 0 AND o.url = ? ORDER BY o.year ASC
SELECT o.* FROM opencps_track_client_statistic AS o WHERE o.day <> 0 AND o.createDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND o.desktop = ? AND o.mobile = ? AND o.tablet = ?
SELECT o.* FROM `opencps_track_client` AS o WHERE o.sessionId = ? AND o.visitDate = (SELECT MAX(visitDate) FROM `opencps_track_client` WHERE sessionId = ? )

select (SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM opencps_track_client WHERE sessionId IN (SELECT sessionId FROM opencps_track_client WHERE userId <> 0)) user WHERE user.leaveDate = (SELECT MAX(leaveDate) FROM opencps_track_client WHERE userId = user.userId)) as o WHERE o.leaveDate > DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL - ? MINUTE )) user, (SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM opencps_track_client WHERE sessionId NOT IN (SELECT sessionId FROM opencps_track_client WHERE userId <> 0)) guest WHERE guest.leaveDate = (SELECT MAX(leaveDate) FROM opencps_track_client WHERE sessionId = guest.sessionId)) as o WHERE o.leaveDate > DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL - ? MINUTE )) guest;
